Package polimi.ingsoft.server.controller

Class MainController

java.lang.Object
polimi.ingsoft.server.controller.MainController
public class MainController extends Object
Controller class that manages the creation and management of matches.

    • createMatch

      public Integer createMatch(Integer requiredNumPlayers) throws NotValidNumPlayersException
      Creates a new match with the specified number of players.
      Parameters:
      requiredNumPlayers - the number of players required for the match
      Returns:
      the ID of the newly created match
      Throws:
      NotValidNumPlayersException - if the number of players is not valid (invalid input: '<' 2 or > 4)

    • deleteMatch

      public void deleteMatch(int matchId)
      Delete the MatchController for the specified match ID.
      Parameters:
      matchId - the ID of the match

    • joinMatch

      public void joinMatch(Integer matchId, String nickname) throws MatchAlreadyFullException, MatchNotFoundException
      Allows a player to join an existing match.
      Parameters:
      matchId - the ID of the match to join
      nickname - the nickname of the player joining the match
      Throws:
      MatchAlreadyFullException - if the match is already full
      MatchNotFoundException - if the match is not found
